channel.title: CVE Feed for SICK AG -- ICR890-4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SICK AG -- ICR890-4

item.title: CVE-2023-35699|2024-08-02T16:30:44.141Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Cleartext Storage on Disk in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow an unauthenticated attacker with local access to the device to disclose sensitive information by accessing a SD card.

item.title: CVE-2023-3270|2024-08-02T06:48:08.407Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to retrieve sensitive information about the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-3271|2024-08-02T06:48:08.371Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Improper Access Control in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to gather information about the system and download data via the REST API by accessing unauthenticated endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2023-35696|2024-08-02T16:30:44.643Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Unauthenticated endpoints in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to retrieve sensitive information about the device via HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-3273|2024-08-02T06:48:08.408Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Improper Access Control in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to affect the availability of the device by changing settings of the device such as the IP address based on missing access control.

item.title: CVE-2023-35697|2024-08-02T16:30:44.508Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow a remote attacker to brute-force user credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-3272|2024-08-02T06:48:08.392Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow a remote attacker to gather sensitive information by intercepting network traffic that is not encrypted.

item.title: CVE-2023-35698|2024-08-02T16:30:44.401Z -- sick%20ag -- icr890-4
item.description: Observable Response Discrepancy in the SICK ICR890-4 could allow a remote attacker to identify valid usernames for the FTP server from the response given during a failed login attempt.
